languages.text: {n}Туша чудовища мерзкой громадой лежит перед вами. Янтарное пламя навсегда покидает его злобные глаза вместе с последними каплями зловонной черной крови, сочащейся из ран. В стороне Главный кормчий медленно приходит в себя и тут же отшатывается от мертвой твари, забористо сквернословя.{/n}

{n}The hulking carcass of the monster lies in front of you. The amber fire has left its baneful eyes, departed along with the last drops of foul blood oozing from its wounds. In the distance, the Master Helmsman slowly regains consciousness. He immediately recoils from the dead creature, swearing profanely.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Туша чудовища мерзкой громадой лежит перед вами. Янтарное пламя навсегда покидает его злобные глаза вместе с последними каплями зловонной черной крови, сочащейся из ран. В стороне Главный кормчий медленно приходит в себя и тут же отшатывается от мертвой твари, забористо сквернословя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The hulking carcass of the monster lies in front of you. The amber fire has left its baneful eyes, gone with the last drops of foul blood oozing from its wounds. In the distance, Chief Helmsman slowly regains consciousness and immediately recoils from the dead creature, swearing profanely.{/n}

In the distance, the Master Helmsman slowly regains consciousness. He immediately recoils from the dead creature, swearing profanely.{/n}

{n}The hulking carcass of the monster lies in front of you. The amber fire has left its baneful eyes, departed along with the last drops of foul blood oozing from its wounds. In the distance, the Master Helmsman slowly regains consciousness. He immediately recoils from the dead creature, swearing profanely.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El imponente cadáver del monstruo yace ante ti. El fuego ambarino ha dejado sus siniestros ojos, igual que las últimas gotas de sangre salen de sus venas. A lo lejos, el maestro timonel recupera lentamente el conocimiento. Inmediatamente recula al ver la criatura muerta, jurando a voz en cuello.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking carcass of the monster lies in front of you. The amber fire has left its baneful eyes, departed along with the last drops of foul blood oozing from its wounds. In the distance, the Master Helmsman slowly regains consciousness. He immediately recoils from the dead creature, swearing profanely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El imponente cadáver del monstruo yace ante ti. El fuego ambarino ha dejado sus siniestros ojos, igual que las últimas gotas de sangre salen de sus venas. A lo lejos, el maestro timonel recupera lentamente el conocimiento. Inmediatamente recula al ver la criatura muerta, jurando a voz en cuello.{/n}

languages.text: {n}バカデカい怪物の死体が目の前に横たわっている。琥珀色の炎はその不吉な目から消えて、傷口からにじみ出た、腐敗した血の最後の一滴とともにどこかへと去っていく。遠くの方で、マスター・ヘルムスマンがゆっくりと意識を取り戻す。男は死んだクリーチャーからサッと距離を取り、汚い言葉で罵倒した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking carcass of the monster lies in front of you. The amber fire has left its baneful eyes, departed along with the last drops of foul blood oozing from its wounds. In the distance, the Master Helmsman slowly regains consciousness. He immediately recoils from the dead creature, swearing profanely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}バカデカい怪物の死体が目の前に横たわっている。琥珀色の炎はその不吉な目から消えて、傷口からにじみ出た、腐敗した血の最後の一滴とともにどこかへと去っていく。遠くの方で、マスター・ヘルムスマンがゆっくりと意識を取り戻す。男は死んだクリーチャーからサッと距離を取り、汚い言葉で罵倒した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}巨大的怪物尸体倒在你面前，恶臭的鲜血从伤口里流了出来，恶毒的双眼中琥珀色的火光也熄灭了。远处的舵手长慢慢恢复了意识，一步步从怪物的尸体处退开，恶狠狠地咒骂着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking carcass of the monster lies in front of you. The amber fire has left its baneful eyes, departed along with the last drops of foul blood oozing from its wounds. In the distance, the Master Helmsman slowly regains consciousness. He immediately recoils from the dead creature, swearing profanely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大的怪物尸体倒在你面前，恶臭的鲜血从伤口里流了出来，恶毒的双眼中琥珀色的火光也熄灭了。远处的舵手长慢慢恢复了意识，一步步从怪物的尸体处退开，恶狠狠地咒骂着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der gigantische Kadaver des Monsters liegt vor dir. Das bernsteinfarbene Feuer ist aus seinen unheilvollen Augen gewichen, als die letzten Tropfen widerwärtiges Blut aus seinen Wunden getropft sind. In der Ferne kommt der Hauptsteuermann langsam wieder zu Sinnen. Er schreckt augenblicklich laut fluchend zurück, als er die tote Kreatur erblickt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking carcass of the monster lies in front of you. The amber fire has left its baneful eyes, departed along with the last drops of foul blood oozing from its wounds. In the distance, the Master Helmsman slowly regains consciousness. He immediately recoils from the dead creature, swearing profanely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der gigantische Kadaver des Monsters liegt vor dir. Das bernsteinfarbene Feuer ist aus seinen unheilvollen Augen gewichen, als die letzten Tropfen widerwärtiges Blut aus seinen Wunden getropft sind. In der Ferne kommt der Hauptsteuermann langsam wieder zu Sinnen. Er schreckt augenblicklich laut fluchend zurück, als er die tote Kreatur erblickt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'imposante carcasse du monstre gît à vos pieds. La flamme ambrée qui animait son regard s'est éteinte, et de ses blessures suintent encore quelques gouttes de son sang nauséabond. Un peu plus loin, le maître timonier reprend lentement connaissance. Lorsqu'il se rend compte de la proximité de la créature, il fait un bond en arrière en laissant échapper un chapelet de jurons.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking carcass of the monster lies in front of you. The amber fire has left its baneful eyes, departed along with the last drops of foul blood oozing from its wounds. In the distance, the Master Helmsman slowly regains consciousness. He immediately recoils from the dead creature, swearing profanely.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Canavarın devasa bedeni, önünde uzanıyor. Kötücül gözlerindeki sarı ateş sönmüş, yaralarından sızan kirli kanın son damlalarıyla beraber yok olmuş. İleride Başserdümen, yavaş yavaş bilincini geri kazanıyor ve ağır bir küfür savurarak ölü yaratıktan derhâl uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulking carcass of the monster lies in front of you. The amber fire has left its baneful eyes, departed along with the last drops of foul blood oozing from its wounds. In the distance, the Master Helmsman slowly regains consciousness. He immediately recoils from the dead creature, swearing profanely.{/n}
